title: Unchained Alistar
body: I've subscribed to the LOL youtube channel however I'm not able to redeem a code for this skin. Could you please help?

replies.body: I'm not 100% sure if that link works for OCE as well, but I did go ahead and get that added onto this account for ya fam!

I was trying to find a woobox link for Unchained Alistar, but it seems that there isn't one for OCE. Based on some old posts I checked out, there doesn't seem to be one for you guys. I would recommend [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), because I believe they have an automated system that will add the skin, otherwise you can wait for a person to get to your ticket. You could also wait for a poro to come back and add it to your account.
